channel.title: CVE Feed for AdminColumns -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AdminColumns -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-24365|2024-08-03T19:28:23.788Z -- admincolumns -- admin%20columns
item.description: The Admin Columns WordPress plugin Free before 4.3.2 and Pro before 5.5.2 allowed to configure individual columns for tables. Each column had a type. The type "Custom Field" allowed to choose an arbitrary database column to display in the table. There was no escaping applied to the contents of "Custom Field" columns.
